p: Thus, it appears that data from very different and increasingly reliable sources are starting to converge to the values which I predicted on “Sunday at 2” TV show on March 1st, ie, 0.5%-1%. Because of all of the above, President of the USA Donald Trump was most likely right to say that this number should be closer to 1% and that he believes that it could even be well below 1% [ 8]. Everything we know about epidemiology and previous pandemics gives us hope that this should be the case.
